EmailTemplate.name: PO Received at QC
EmailTemplate.subject: Follow Up to Confirm PO - {!PurchaseOrder_LineItem__c.Name} is scheduled for Quality Control
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Operations Team:
This is a friendly reminder that {!PurchaseOrder_LineItem__c.PONameLink__c} has been in Received at QC Status for more than 24 hours. Please ensure QC is scheduled to be performed, and notify {!PurchaseOrder_LineItem__c.POOrderOwner__c} if there are any delays resulting from Quality Control interruptions.
If {!PurchaseOrder_LineItem__c.PONameLink__c} has been reviewed by QC and there are no problems, please update the PO Status to the correct stage by filling in the appropriate fields.
{!PurchaseOrder_LineItem__c.PONameLink__c}
Thanks a bunch, Ralph the Rooster
